questions.question_text: Your company wants greater visibility into their traffic and has asked you to start planning an SSL Decryption project. The company does not have a PKI infrastructure, and multiple certificates would be needed for this project. Which type of certificate can you use to generate other certificates?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
A is correct

Selected Answer: A
It's A

A. Alternatively, generate a self-signed Root CA certificate on the firewall and create a subordinate Forward Trust CA certificate on that firewall to install on network devices. Self-signed certificates are best for small companies that donâ€™t have an Enterprise Root CA and for proof-of-concept (POC) trials. See Passam link.
https://docs.paloaltonetworks.com/best-practices/9-1/decryption-best-practices/decryption-best-practices/plan-ssl-decryption-best-practice-deployment

choices.A: The Panorama section overrides the Device section. The accounts need to be configured only in the Panorama section.
choices.D: Configuration in the sections is merged together. The accounts need to be configured in either section.
choices.C: The Device section overrides Panorama section. The accounts need to be configured only in the Device section.
choices.B: The sections are independent. The accounts need to be configured in both the Device and Panorama sections.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B is correct

Selected Answer: B
B correct

B

https://docs.paloaltonetworks.com/panorama/10-1/panorama-admin/panorama-overview/centralized-firewall-configuration-and-update-management/context-switchfirewall-or-panorama

Selected Answer: B
100% B. Have seen this in a live network. You won't be able to log into managed Firewalls when you only have an account in Panorama. ( However you can change context if allowed)

comments.content:
Panorama section is for managing Panorama, and Device section is for managing devices. They are independents.
Correct is B

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
https://docs.paloaltonetworks.com/pan-os/9-1/pan-os-web-interface-help/panorama-web-interface/panorama-administrators

questions.question_text:
//IMG//
Refer to the screenshots. Without the ability to use Context Switch, where do admin accounts need to be configured in order to provide admin access to Panorama and to the managed devices?

A firewall just submitted a file to WildFire for analysis. Assume a 5-minute window for analysis. The firewall is configured to check for verdicts every 5 minutes.
How quickly will the firewall receive back a verdict?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
submit then get back result in 5- 10 mins, study guide

Selected Answer: D
Correct answer is D

Per the PCNSE study notes:
"WildFire Analysis Profiles indicate which files are to be forwarded according to system-wide WildFire configuration settings. WildFire typically renders a verdict on a file within 5 to 10 minutes of receipt."

Selected Answer: D
It can take 5 to 10 minutes

Selected Answer: D
Submit timestamp + 5min. check for verdicts makes more than 5min. and less than 10min. to get a result.

Selected Answer: D
D is correct

agree B

choices.D: a Decryption policy and a Data Filtering profile
choices.A: a WildFire profile and a File Blocking profile
choices.C: a Vulnerability Protection profile and a QoS policy
choices.B: a Vulnerability Protection profile and a Decryption policy

questions.question_text:
A firewall administrator needs to be able to inspect inbound HTTPS traffic on servers hosted in their DMZ to prevent the hosted service from being exploited.
Which combination of features can allow PAN-OS to detect exploit traffic in a session with TLS encapsulation?

discussion.content: I passed PCNSE last night. Lots of questions from here, many not from here, but by looking all these questions up you shouldn't have any problems

BD

The same question as Q222 and Q373.

Selected Answer: BD
log forwarding is in Objects so its under device group not template
BD, log forwarding is under Objects. Hence, it's under Device groups and not templates

questions.question_text:
Engineer was tasked to simplify configuration of multiple firewalls with a specific set of configurations shared across all devices.
Which two advantages would be gained by using multiple templates in a stack? (Choose two.)

choices.B: standardizes server profiles and authentication configuration across all stacks
choices.C: standardizes log-forwarding profiles for security policies across all stacks
choices.D: defines a common standard template configuration for firewalls
